parameters.name: DBProxyEngineType
parameters.description: A reserved parameter. You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: DbInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DbProxyConnectString
parameters.description: The dedicated proxy endpoint of the instance.

parameters.name: DbProxyEndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the proxy endpoint. You can call the DescribeDBProxyEndpoint operation to query the ID of the proxy endpoint.

parameters.name: DbProxySslEnabled
parameters.description:
The SSL configuration setting that you want to apply on the instance. Valid values:

*   0: disables SSL encryption.
*   1: enables SSL encryption or modifies the endpoint that requires SSL encryption.
*   2: updates the validity period of the SSL certificate.

> This setting causes your instance to restart. Proceed with caution.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
